explains: adj. 公认的；被普遍认可的
v. 承认；答谢；告知已收到；搭理（acknowledge 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.en: The country acknowledged his claim to the throne.
sentences.cn: 这个国家承认了他继承王位的权利。

sentences.en: Belatedly, the government has acknowledged the problem.
sentences.cn: 政府过晚地承认了这个问题。

sentences.en: Naylor acknowledged, in a letter to the judge, that he was a drug addict.
sentences.cn: 在一封写给法官的信中，内勒承认他是一个吸毒者。
